name: British Council
membership: EUNIC, Practitioners Network, More Europe-Culture and External action, the Big 4
goal:
The British Council creates international opportunities for the people of the UK and other countries, and builds trust between them worldwide.

The British Council works in over 100 countries, connecting millions of people with the United Kingdom through programmes and services in the English language, the Arts, Education and Society (Gender, justice, civil society and social enterprise).
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: social enterprise, gender equality, creative economy, youth employment, access to justice, cultural diplomacy, security and youth resilience, sport, school and higher education
